item.title: 【Live Audios (lossless)】FLAC - Jorja Smith + ENNY @ Hollywood Palladium 2025-08-12 (audience recording)
item.description:
Hidden Content:
You must either reply or click 'Like' to see the hidden information contained here.
there are other guest vocalists, no idea who. Excellent show, packed, way better than the Ace show in 2023. Amazing crowd. Actually did some creeper shit and took a photo of a silhouette of a 6 foot tall 20 something woman and sent to my friends "this is what the crowd is like at non-metal and geezer shows." I have had friends complain on Facebook about not meeting women at shows when I regularly go to shows that are 70% and up female, usually way younger and even I get approached.



(She actually took a panoramic shot and I saw myself in the frame or else I wouldn't have done it)


JORJA SMITH
HOLLYWOOD, CA @ HOLLYWOOD PALLADIUM
2025-08-12

SP-CMC-4U -> A10 -> Soundforge -> FLAC

01. -intro-
02. Try Me
03. Blue Lights
04. Addicted
05. Feelings
06. Greatest Gift
07. Broken is the man
08. Where Did I Go?
09. Peng Black Girls Remix (with ENNY)
10. falling or flying
11. GO GO GO
12. Myself
13. Burn
14. Backwards
15. February 3rd
16. Tomorrow
17. The One
18. Come Over
19. With You
20. The Way I Love You
21. Teenage Fantasy
22. Be Honest
23. On My Mind
24. Little Things


ENNY
HOLLYWOOD, CA @ HOLLYWOOD PALLADIUM
2025-08-12

SP-CMC-4U -> A10 -> Soundforge -> FLAC

(no setlist)

item.title: 【Instrumentals / Karaoke (lossless)】WAV - Lana Del Rey - Playing Dangerous (Bad Girl Officer) [Official Demo Stems] | 44kHz/24bit
item.description:
So this is literally a scrapped demo version of Born To Die. I found the sessions and mixed the stems (only timestamp, voice effects had already been finalized).
I also added Acapella, Instrumental and TV Track.
